sentence.Network_en: Sue and John were especially thrilled with this award.

sentence.Network_en: I was so thrilled to get a good report from him.

sentence.Network_en: "I'm absolutely thrilled to have done what I've done," he declared.
sentence.Network_cn: 他宣称道：“我为自己的所作所为感到兴奋不已。”

——“令人激动”(thrilled)出现了13次。　　——“疯狂地专注”(maniacally focused)出现了2次。

英语口语8000句16高兴时 - 听力课堂 ... I'm happy.( 我很幸福。) I'm thrilled.( 我太激动了。) I feel so happy.( 我非常高兴。).

entry.tran: 欣喜若狂的;非常开心的
entry.def: If someone is thrilled, they are extremely pleased about something.

example.ex: I was so thrilled to get a good report from him...
example.tran: 收到他的好消息让我欣喜若狂。

example.ex: Sue and John were especially thrilled with this award...
example.tran: 休和约翰对于获得这个奖项感到兴奋不已。
